title: Monster Sunfish
body: <p>Dave just IM'd me <a href="http://www.stuff.co.nz/stuff/0,2106,3070756a10,00.html" title="Monster washes up near Farewell Spit, NZ">this thing about a monster ocean sunfish</a>.  Looks bizarro.</p><p>[Update]: I searched <a href="http://news.google.com/news?q=monster+sunfish" title="q=monster+sunfish">Google news</a> for more articles and I found <a href="http://news.scotsman.com/scitech.cfm?id=1172382004" title="wee, not so wee, and FRICKIN' HUGE">this article from Scotland</a>.  They thought the 3 foot, 50 pound sunfish they caught was a freak - HA! That's nothing compared to the pseudo-aussie's 3m, 1 tonne sunfish. (is that the same as a ton?)</p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-10-20

Monster Sunfish

Dave just IM'd me
wee, not so wee, and FRICKIN' HUGE
